bill.summary:
This resolution expresses the House of Representatives' opposition to a hard border between Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland, which could result from the withdrawal of the United Kingdom (UK) from the European Union (EU).
(Northern Ireland is part of the UK, and the Republic of Ireland is an EU member state. There is currently an open border between them.)
